spec.description: Le petit monde School (L'Ã©cole Le Petit Monde) is a private educational institution in Casablanca. The school building was designed by architect **Albert Planque**, who was active during the French Protectorate era. Its architecture likely reflects the functional and often aesthetically simple design applied to educational and residential buildings in the mid-20th century, ensuring a healthy and spacious environment for students. It continues to operate as a school.
